Direct Translation: whom I longed for, I sat down,
Poetic Translation: by the one I longed for sat I;

Lyrics: et fructus ejus dulcis gutturi meo.
Direct Translation: and his fruit tasted sweet to me.
Poetic Translation: his fruit was pleasant and ripe: How sweet its flavor!

Lyrics: Introduxit me rex in cellam vinariam
Direct Translation: The King brought me into his wine cellar
Poetic Translation: For the King has brought me here into his wine cellar;
by his will he set his love upon me.

Direct Translation: for I am sick with love.
Poetic Translation: for love afflicts me with longing.
